content.rendered:
We had been trying to buy a certain funeral home for years. After considerable frustration in doing so, I contacted Johnson Consulting to ask for their assistance. After several months Johnson Consulting was able to secure the funeral home for us. We could not be happier with the results and thank the Johnson Consulting Group for bringing it home for us, and for their professionalism and guidance.

John Vincent Scalia
The John Vincent Scalia Home for Funerals
28 Eltingville Blvd.
Staten Island, New York 10312
